column5: You Folks are in for some cool Cat Fishing TV Shows coming soon to TV. I spent the last few days setting up a few awesome Cat shows!  What a great time.  First I went off with the Boys from (Extreme Angler )Karl & Dave.  We were slamming huge cats from 18 to 20lbs ...  Thanks Guys for coming down to Dunnville  Extreme Angler Slide Show   This week Pete Bowman and his crew from Fish n Canada came out.  The fishing was tough at first but we managed to find some huge cats in deep water. Landing some over the 20lb range>  It was a blast fishing with you Pete and Mike I had a great time ...  Fish'n Canada Slide Show
Cool.  You know when they'll be airing and on what station?
Extreme Angler (Jan) Fish'in Canada (Sept) I will post dates and times once all Edited for TV

....Hey now that's cool. I have had the pleasure of meeting and chattting with both Pete and Karl, both top shelf kind a guys. Just missed you this past Sunday as well Steve, I was heading out (white GM van, black Lund) as you returned from some turkey hunting classes you were giving (I think).
You really know how to put folks on them Steve!! Well done!
Great news Steve! Can't wait to see the shows!!! For those of you that haven't fished cats on the Grand before, YOU"VE GOT TO TRY IT!!!
congrats, very cool, looks like u should be the one with the show  never understood fishing shows (professionals) needing a guide to go fishing, kind of an oxymoron

Professionals teach other Professionals ...not all Tv host have fished for other types of fish ..ive been fishing since i could hold a pole in my hand  all over  Canada and the World ...ive just been very lucky to be able to fish all types of fish and stick at it on a daily basis ...once you learn you never forget ..Man i Love Fishing
Good Job Fishmaster-I know the guys had a blast with you! some people have to find negatives in everything!  Hopefully we can return the favor on Simcoe.  Mark
When those boys call ya for direction and advice you are on your game. Sweet report.

Good to see someone still promoting the big cats.... Tiring of all the ski's eyes and bucket mouths. There is another species worthy out there guys! Who knows.... maybe someone will break my record with one outta your waters... It's about time it happens... and someone else takes the reigns....  Nice work fishmaster.... They aren't the same as we see on t.v.  Been with several myself over the years.... Someone can always teach you something...  Maybe one day we can fish cats together.... How are they lately anyways?
Glad to hear it went well bud,,,i never doubted it,,,be down this week sometime to put some big ones in the boat!!
Sonny wish all the best my Cat days are just about done for the season ..Now It's King Time
The cats here bite all summer long ..if your down this way stop in maybe ill have time to get out with ya ..
